Title: Increasing Subsequence II
Description: Given an array of n integers, your task is to calculate the number of increasing subsequences it contains. If two subsequences have the same values but in different positions in the array, they are counted separately.
Input Specification:
The first input line has an integer n: the size of the array. 
 The second line has n integers x_1,x_2,\dots,x_n: the contents of the array.
Output Specification: Print one integer: the number of increasing subsequences modulo 10^9+7.
